message: Let's be fair, Bob. I take a bit more upfront, but we both win!
I think we can both do better than that. This offer is more fair and gives us both a good amount.
Bob, time is money!  This is the same split you offered, but in my favor. Take it before it shrinks even more!
Let's be reasonable, Alice. This is a fair split for both of us, considering the inflation.  It's time to end this back and forth.
